metadata.title: CVE-2023-37360 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: pacparser_find_proxy in Pacparser before 1.4.2 allows JavaScript injection,and possibly privilege escalation, when the attacker controls the URL(which may be realistic within enterprise security products).

criterions.comment: pacparser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
